thread.section_title: Arts and Entertainment coverage for all ages and interests - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: ‘Pound,’ Marga Gomez’s 11th solo show, packs a punch
thread.title_full: ‘Pound,’ Marga Gomez’s 11th solo show, packs a punch - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Robert Hurwitt
title: ‘Pound,’ Marga Gomez’s 11th solo show, packs a punch
text:
Photo: Ian Douglas Marga Gomez in her 11th solo show. Marga Gomez in her 11th solo show.
Marga Gomez is celibate? We’d heard that “Pound,” the San Francisco lesbian comedy icon’s latest monologue, contains some edgy material. The run at Brava Theater that begins previews Thursday, Oct. 15, is off-limits to those under 18. But this notion is truly a shocker. Marga Gomez in her 11th solo show. Marga Gomez in her 11th solo show.
